ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the identifier for the adverse event that precipitated this encounter.

ReferenceDocuments.name: N/A
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission datasets, may be used to create RELREC to link this record with a record in the Adverse Events domain.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Intent is to establish a link between the healthcare encounter record and the AE that was the primary cause of the encounter. HOAENO can be used in RELREC to identify a relationship between records in HO dataset and records in the AE dataset. Other identifiers needed to create RELREC such as HOMHNO can be created as needed. See section 8.2 in the SDTMIG V3.2 for information on RELREC.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the identifier for t
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the identifier for the adverse event(s), which precipitated the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM]?
